message: Let's split the money, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's a good deal for both of us in the first round.
I'm willing to give you a slight edge, Alice.  Let's see if this works for you.
Bob, my turn.  Your offer wasn't great. I'm willing to come down a bit, but this needs to be more fair to me.  I propose 58/42.
Alice, let's make a deal. I'll take a slightly smaller share, but I'm confident this will lead to a quicker resolution.  We both lose money with every round we wait.
Bob, we're approaching the halfway point, and we both lose if we wait too long.  I'm adjusting my offer slightly again, but it needs to reflect the time pressure.  Do we have a deal at 56/44?
Alice, we're both losing money with every passing round. Let's end this now. I'm willing to take a slightly larger share, but this is my final offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  You're pushing this dangerously close to the deadline. I'm compromising again, but this is as low as I go.  54/46, take it or leave it.
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my final offer. Let's end this before we both get nothing.
